turst me you two are better off alone. Groups are interesting and fun
somet=
imes,
but there is too much drama......

I am not in any group per =
say.  I just go out with my friends and have
fun doing what we do.  I have =
some VERY good friends on here that I
consider family and we exchange infor=
mation on a daily basis.  When I
get my website up and running I will be fo=
rming a 4-5 person
investigative team.  But until then its just my wife and=
 I enjoy going
out and having fun talking with the deceased ........:)
 
Je=
ff

	I have A LOT OF TOYS at this time.  Which I am su=
re a lot of
other paranormal investigators have as well.  I am not selling =
this unit
because it does not work but because it does work and I have lots=
 of
other toys and boxes that work as well.  I also have a few other boxes
=
that I will be selling and maybe listing on Ebay as well.  And I just
recen=
tly went on an investigation at Eastern State Penn and I had so
much equipm=
ent there and not enough hands or body to carry it, LOL.  So
I do not want =
to put myself in that position oagain.
	 
	Jeff
	 
	In a message dated 8/12=
/2008 11:43:19 A.M. Central Standard
Time, elabeth@... writes:

		

	=
	I'll ask some local ghost hunters I know if they'd be
interested and
		pas=
s along your email addy. If you get great responses
then why sell
		it? I k=
now they're gonna ask. haha I'd keep the toys
that work well.
		I'm sure th=
e editing did cut out some waiting around
etc., and I
		haven't read Ryan's=
 blog about the episode yet. He will
usually say
		something about it there=
 if the editing is done to make
something seem
		more than what it was and =
I've seen him express concern
about
		production things there before, so I =
think he'll mention
it if the
		footage was heavily edited.
		
		~Elabeth

ndition and only used a few times.

eadings? If I
